list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrate distinguished by the possession of feathers, wings, and a beak and (typically) by being able to fly.
a person of a specified kind or character.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm a pretty tough old bird
